channel.title: Guide on writing log easy to understand. [2.0.2]
channel.description:
Im too tired looking at these logs so im making this hopefully someone will learn it and improve their writing skills! 1. How to write your logs: -As writing your log, you must write with full info you got that night/day and be as easy as possible to understand! 2. Based Class Logs:
[quote] <big>[color=DodgerBlue]**Butler**[/color]<big>
N1: Wine 2 - Success | N2: Wine 3 - Immune | N3: Party | D4: Poisoned King |
[/quote]
[quote] <big>[color=DodgerBlue]**Chronomancer**[/color]<big>
N1: TW 2 - DND | N2: TW 3 - Delayed | D3: PD | or N3: PD + TW 4 - DNR |
[/quote]
[quote] <big>[color=DodgerBlue]**Court Wizard**[/color]<big>
N1: Emp 2 - Nothing | N2: Emp 3 - Aided | N3: Swap 4 & 5 - Success | D4: CM 6 | or N4: CM 6 + Emp 7 - Nothing |
[/quote]
[quote] <big>[color=DodgerBlue]**Drunk**[/color]<big>
N1: Force 2 > King - Success | N2: Force 3 > 2 - Unable | N3: HH 4 - Success |
[/quote]
[quote] <big>[color=DodgerBlue]**Hunter**[/color]<big>
Does Hunter really need logs? Oh he does!
N1: Bear | N2: No Bear | N3: Wolf 2 - Success | [/quote]
[quote] <big>[color=DodgerBlue]**Knight**[/color]<big>
N1: Defend 2 - Nothing | N2: Defend 3 - Killed Attacker | N3: CS 4 - Success |
[/quote]
[quote] <big>[color=DodgerBlue]**Maid**[/color]<big>
Starting : [2] |
N1: Match 2 & 3 - Comp | N2: Match 3 & 4 - Incomp | N3: Nosy 4 > 5 - Visited |
[/quote]
[quote] <big>[color=DodgerBlue]**Mystic**[/color]<big>
N1: Link 2 - Claim Knight | N2: Link 3 - Didnt claim |
[/quote]
[quote] <big>[color=DodgerBlue]**Noble**[/color]<big>
N1: Spy | N2: Gossip 2 - No feedbacks | N3: Gossip 3 - DNR Heal, Framed |
[/quote]
[quote] <big>[color=DodgerBlue]**Observer**[/color]<big>
N1: Follow 2 - 3 > [2] > 4 | N2: Peek 5 - BD |
[/quote]
[quote] <big>[color=DodgerBlue]**Paladin**[/color]<big>
N1: Test 2 - NS | N2: Test 3 - Cult | N3: Smite 4 - Nothing | N4: Smite 5 - Killed CL |
[/quote]
[quote] <big>[color=DodgerBlue]**Physician**[/color]<big>
N1: Heal 2 - DNR | D2: Exhume 3 - Assassin | N2: Self Care - Healed | N3: Inoculated 4 + Heal 5 - DNR |
[/quote]
[quote] <big>[color=DodgerBlue]**Prince**[/color]<big>
N1: Jail 2 - Phys | N2: Jail 3 - No Claim | N3: Jail 4 - Maid, Exe |
[/quote]
[quote] <big>[color=DodgerBlue]**Princess**[/color]<big>
N1: Flirt 2 - S/S | N2: Flirt 3 - K/O | N3: Flirt 4 - S/I | N4: WoW 5 - Didnt Attacked | N5: WoW 6 - Attacked |
[/quote]
[quote] <big>[color=DodgerBlue]**Sheriff**[/color]<big>
Current Scout : [5] |
D1: Scout 2 - Visited | N1: Invest 3 - NS.MM | N2: Scout 5 - Visited + Invest 4 - NS.MM | N3: Invest 6 - Unseen | N4: Surv 7 - MasterMind |
[/quote]

item.title: Guide on writing log easy to understand. [2.0.2]
item.dc:creator: Mercenary
item.description:
It’s a drunk log when I’m redirected
Not an obs log while redirected. They are x > x > x | x > x > x

Read full topic
item.source: Guide on writing log easy to understand. [2.0.2]

item.title: Guide on writing log easy to understand. [2.0.2]
item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
Ohhh it’s supposed to be drunk logs but bad

Uh just make it shorter like

N1: Deb 5->3, redirected to 9(5->9) | Success

Btw you can’t even be forced off of king unless a CW was debauched to king first

Read full topic
item.source: Guide on writing log easy to understand. [2.0.2]

item.title: Guide on writing log easy to understand. [2.0.2]
item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
SweetyCake:

N2: Force 2 > King => Redirected 4 > King / Success

The fuck???

No we shouldn’t

Also that’s so long and unnecessarily complicated

Read full topic
item.source: Guide on writing log easy to understand. [2.0.2]

item.title: Guide on writing log easy to understand. [2.0.2]
item.dc:creator: SweetyCake
item.description:
We should handle Redirect like this :

N1: Invest 2 => Redirected 4 / NS.MM |
N2: Force 2 > King => Redirected 4 > King / Success |
N3: Follow 3 => Redirected 10 / 2 > [10] > 4 |

@NuclearBurrito

Read full topic
item.source: Guide on writing log easy to understand. [2.0.2]

So lets say I’m drunk

I try to send 4 to 5. I get redirected from 4 to 7.

N1: (4->7) -> 5 - Worked/Immune

item.title: Guide on writing log easy to understand. [2.0.2]
item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
I prefer to abbreviate anything I can, or anything that will make my logs compact but still easy to read is good

Your logs are good for beginners, but are a bit too long for my tastes

Someone in the dead chat was like “what idiot bears all 3 nights in a row”. My response was of course “not me. I lied”
